author: Luke Yee <lucyee01@meta.com>
description:
Hi Piotr,

Hope you are well in these interesting times. My name's Luke and I support Meta's Technical Leadership hiring and I wanted to reach out to you as your years in the industry shows you are someone who is working at the highest level of technical excellence. I also noticed you've interviewed with us before so I'm happy to discuss our options!

Priority Verticals:

  *   Llama 4: Check out the new features and capabilities of Llama 4 here<https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fai.meta.com%2Fblog%2Fllama-4-multimodal-intelligence%2F&h=AT3G1Japo_81YxoMDYNFwRjsHM0gny5hlQ-uYx4D4tUCXoV1LInpUJgWD1Dx2RMA0H7r_VOL2QZjLyHxf7juuvClHbVpgiFPkwGhL9hlgDsD_83BA6tF9f12cjndkTxBsWpUfmXoPqKxsgap8qTqAhB396Mhaa51X0z9Yd_ejmI>
  *   Monetization & Ads: Marketing tools and ad solutions that helps take businesses to the next level here.<https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fbusiness.meta.com%2F%3Flocale%3Den_US&h=AT2dJxhcuFazTuiItiR1dAj2v3qIZ8XDhDe9PCFFcETRBwpaBeSiZ7SfWx7_2XSlQbDFAa2
title: Open to Tech Leadership opportunity chats with Meta?
